qr.title: Product QR Code
qr.description: Scan this QR code to verify product authenticity and access detailed information
qr.instructions: Use your smartphone camera or QR code reader app to scan

features.0: Advanced lithium-ion technology for optimal performance
features.1: Built-in safety features and protection circuits
features.2: Extended cycle life and reliable power output

measures.1: Keep in upright position at all times
measures.3: Do not add pure water (Pure water level should be 1.5 cm above plates)
measures.4: Always wear protective goggles suitable for working conditions during battery maintenance (adding water, cleaning, charging)
measures.5: Wear protective clothing if there is a risk of acid splashing

general.0: Always store upright in a dry and cool place (10°C - 25°C)
general.1: Place batteries on wooden pallets to avoid direct contact with concrete floor

chargeLevel.0: Pre-sale battery charge level should be above 12.6V
chargeLevel.1: Minimum voltage during storage should be 12.4V
chargeLevel.2: If voltage is low, open package and charge at 16.1V and 1/20Cn current to prevent permanent damage

installation.0: Verify battery compatibility from vehicle manual
installation.5: Install new battery (connect positive cable first)

procedures.contact: In case of eye or skin contact, rinse with plenty of water.
procedures.ingestion: If swallowed: Drink plenty of water and milk. Consult a doctor.
procedures.spill: Spillage: Wash small spills with water.
procedures.gases: If gases are released, ventilate the area.
procedures.spark: Keep away from sparks and flames.
procedures.fire: In case of fire, use appropriate fire extinguisher.
procedures.devices: Turn off and remove electrical devices.

details.layoutNotAvailable: DPP layout not available for product type:

measures.0: Always follow proper handling and storage guidelines
measures.1: Keep away from extreme temperatures and moisture
measures.2: Use appropriate personal protective equipment when handling

hazards.title: Hazards
hazards.healthDesc: Battery acid can cause severe irritation to skin and eyes.
hazards.corrosiveDesc: Battery acid can corrode metals and tissues.
hazards.warningDesc: Improper use may cause serious injury.
hazards.explosiveDesc: Battery gas is explosive, keep away from sparks and flames.
hazards.environmentalDesc: Battery chemicals are harmful to the environment, prevent release into nature.

categories.bulb: Bulb (Energy Saving, Fluorescent Lamp, LED Bulb)

categories.foot_leg_protection_chemical: Foot Leg Protection - Chemical or Radioactive Risks
categories.hand_arm_protection_material_gloves: Hand Arm Protection - Gloves (Leather, Fabric or Other Materials)
categories.hand_arm_protection_chemical: Hand Arm Protection - Chemical or Radioactive Risks
categories.carousels_type_c: Carousels - Type C (Mushroom-shaped Carousel, Spinning Carousel)
categories.yarn_fabric_for_end_user: Yarn and Fabric for End User
categories.cellular_terminal_device: Cellular Communication Terminal Device (GSM, IMT VB.)
categories.wireless_alarm_security_systems: Wireless Alarm and Security Systems Devices
categories.wireless_well_automation_device: Wireless Well Automation Device (Only Produced in Turkey)
categories.wireless_meter_reading_systems: Wireless Meter Reading Systems (Only Produced in Turkey)
categories.model_aircraft_drone_remote_control: Model Aircraft and Humanoid Drone Remote Control Systems
categories.tv_fm_radio_transmitter_devices: TV and FM Radio Transmitter Devices
